content: This is perhaps the wrong place to post this, but I'm getting the hang of this chat system and this would appear to be the correct spot. Will there be another DevDays Student-Track in 2017? Is there information on what the requirements are to join? And this might be a rather broad question: where to start on the self-learning process? There is just so much information I'm just not sure where to begin. Thank you for your time!

Hi @Rob Clements , yes, there will be a Student Track at DevDays this year. The dates for the event are 15-17 November. If your university wants to participate, send an email to fhir@furore.com. Keep an eye on www.fhirdevdays.com for the details.
